summary: ABS INDICATOR ASSOCIATED WITH WIRE HARNESS.  THIS PROBLEM WAS ASSOCIATED WITH 1998 MODELS AND SHOULD BE REVIEWED FOR 1999 MODELS TOO.  ABS MODULE NEEDING REPLACING AT APPROXIMATELY 30,000 MILES.  ALSO EXPERIENCE DELAY OR LAPSE TIME FOR VEHICLE TO STOP.
